radiographic_examinations.findings: Advanced arthritis of the left hip and mild arthritis of the right hip.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Anteroposterior radiograph of the left hip

radiographic_examinations.findings: Postoperative cement mantles were graded A bilaterally despite extensive sclerosis of the cortex.
Wear of both acetabular components and deformed femur bilaterally from malunited fractures; no evidence of loosening or migration of the components.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Wear of the polyethylene noted on both sides.
